page.title: 04TRADE IN WALKERGATE
page.content: Throughout the area there is a range of{shops and small businesses.}The Fossway Builders Merchants sell all kinds of materials to other builders and DIY enthusiasts.The Mini_Market has been a shop since l934.It is open from 0800_1700(closed 1hr for lunch) 6 days/week and has about 200 customers per day.The Butchers Shop on the corner of Sutton Street has been open for 36 yrs.The most popular meat is beef which he gets from the market in Newcastle.Mr Knowles runs a newsagents and general dealers.He is open from 0630_2100.People use his shop for 'emergency'shopping(for things they forgot to get in town). Mr Cheng opens every day except Mon and Tues.selling fish and chips as well as Chinese food.One of the newest small businesses here is a Computer Agency.
